6.44: Unstable Concoction Increased cast range from 600/650/700/750 to 650/750/850/950. Increased damage per channeled second from 50 to 60 (max possible damage: 120/180/240/300). Increased  Chemical Rage health regen from 10/30/60 to 15/30/60.

6.47: Increased movement speed from 290 to 300.  Unstable Concoction no longer gets canceled when  Chemical Rage expires during the channeling.

Acid Spray Increased manacost from 120 to 160. Reduced radius from 700 to 550. Reduced cast range from 700 to 550.  Unstable Concoction now provides 500 radius ground vision around the target, starting upon cast, lasting until the projectile reaches it. Alchemist also faces the target for the whole channeling duration now.  Greevil's Greed Reduced Gold bonus cap from 20 to 18. Reduced stack duration from 20 to 18.  Chemical Rage Reduced health regen] from 15/30/60 to 10/30/60. Now grants 0/5/10 movement speed.

6.79: Chemical Rage No longer provides 250/500/750 bonus health. Increased health regen from 15/30/60 to 50/75/100.
6.52: Added an allied only visual indicator to  Unstable Concoction, showing for how long Alchemist is channeling it. Reduced  Chemical Rage movement speed bonus 60/60/60 to 30/40/60.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Acid Spray Increased damage from 8/16/24/32 to 14/20/26/32. Reduced manacost from 160 to 130/140/150/160.  Unstable Concoction Increased max damage from 130/200/270/340 to 150/220/290/360. No longer displays the countdown numbers to enemies. Now always affects a 175 area around where it explodes (Includes when it explodes on Alchemist). 6.74: Increased base armor from -1 to 0 (total armor is now 1.54). Increased  Unstable Concoction max damage from 120/180/240/300 to 130/200/270/340.
6.76: Unstable Concoction now explodes around you if you are killed while charging it up. Increased  Greevil's Greed gold bonus cap from 26 to 30.
6.71: Reduced Movement speed from 300 to 295. Reduced  Chemical Rage health bonus from 350/700/1050 to 300/600/900.

6.59: Acid Spray no longer damages  Tombstone Zombies.
6.80: Reduced night vision from 1400 to 800.  Unstable Concoction Reduced maximum brew duration from 7 to 5.5. Max power is still reached after 5 seconds. No longer continues to get stronger while it is in the air.
6.82: Acid Spray Changed damage type from composite to physical (still pierces spell immunity). Increased armor reduction from 3/4/5/6 to 4/5/6/7. Reduced damage from 14/20/26/32 to 12/16/20/24.

6.84: Unstable Concoction Damage is no longer reduced by Damage Block. Countdown can now be seen by enemies. Now has an area targeting cursor.  Greevil's Greed now grants 4x gold bounty from runes. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Alchemist: Alchemist can cast Aghanim's Scepter to directly grant any allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter bonuses as a buff (the hero upgrade and the stat upgrade). The scepter is consumed in the process. Multiple instances of this buff do not stack. Alchemist can target himself as well.
6.78c: Reduced  Chemical Rage health bonus from 300/600/900 to 250/500/750.
